title: BRIEF-Wanda Hotel Development Enters Into Deed Of Assignment With Wanda Hk
text:
BRIEF-Wanda Hotel Development Enters Into Deed Of Assignment With Wanda Hk

Stock Markets 6 minutes ago (Oct 18, 2019 22:35)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Wanda Hotel Development Enters Into Deed Of Assignment With Wanda Hk Oct 18 (Reuters) - Wanda Hotel Development Co Ltd : * ENTERED INTO DEED OF ASSIGNMENT OF LONDON PROJECT RECEIVABLES WITH WANDA HK * UNDER AGREEMENT, CO TO ASSIGN TO WANDA HK RIGHTS, TITLE AND BENEFITS FROM LONDON PROJECT RECEIVABLES FOR £24 MILLION * WANDA AUSTRALIA RE ENTERED INTO DEED OF ASSIGNMENT OF AUSTRALIA PROJECTS RECEIVABLES WITH WANDA HK * WANDA HK TO ACCEPT RIGHTS, TITLE AND BENEFITS FROM AUSTRALIA PROJECTS RECEIVABLES OF A$105 MILLION * ENTERED INTO HOTEL DESIGN FRAMEWORK AGREEMENT WITH DALIAN WANDA GROUP * ENTERED INTO HOTEL CONSTRUCTION MANAGEMENT FRAMEWORK AGREEMENT WITH DALIAN WANDA GROUP

BRIEF-Wanda Hotel Development Enters Into Deed Of Assignment With Wanda Hk
description: BRIEF-Wanda Hotel Development Enters Into Deed Of Assignment With Wanda Hk
